name: Searchdocuments
description:
Search documents by the query parameters described below.

> Avoid sending too many requests with wildcards (`*`) in the search parameters or that use the `keyword` parameter. This may lead to this endpoint being temporarily blocked for your account. If this happens you will receive an error with status code `503`.

Content-Type.description: Type of the content being sent

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand

_fields.description: Fields that will be returned by document

_where.description: Specification of filters. As seen below

_schema.description: Enter with the name of the schema to filter documents by compatibility of the schema.

_sort.description: Use ASC value to sort ascending or DESC value to sort descending.
